Baron - The Real Estate Simulation
by Blue Chip

Publication date 1983
Language English
Baron - The Real Estate Simulation (1983)(Blue Chip)[cr Whip]
Notes

Disk info for Baron_The_Real_Estate_Simulation_1983_Blue_Chip_cr_Whip.do:

Disk Name: DISK VOLUME #254

Free Space (bytes): 94720
Used Space (bytes): 48640
Physical Size (KB): 140
Free Space (KB): 92
Used Space (KB): 47
Archive Order: DOS
Disk Format: DOS 3.3
Total Sectors: 560
Free Sectors: 370
Used Sectors: 190
Tracks On Disk: 35
Sectors On Disk: 16

Disk directory for Baron_The_Real_Estate_Simulation_1983_Blue_Chip_cr_Whip.do:

a2_Baron_The_Real_Estate_Simulation_1983_Blue_Chip_cr_Whip/Baron_The_Real_Estate_Simulation_1983_Blue_Chip_cr_Whip.do DISK VOLUME #254
A 045 BARINIT.BAS 
T 038 DATA.RND 
T 024 SAVE 
T 002 RANDOM.DTA 
T 002 GCHAR.DTA 
A 002 HELLO 
T 002 CHECK 
T 004 PLAYER 
T 007 MORTGAGE.RND 
DOS 3.3 format; 94,720 bytes free; 48,640 bytes used. 

Text found in Baron_The_Real_Estate_Simulation_1983_Blue_Chip_cr_Whip.do/BARINIT.BAS:

3 AD = PEEK(175) + PEEK(176) *256:OS = PEEK(AD -3) + PEEK(AD -2) *256:AD = AD -OS: POKE 1013,76: POKE 1014,AD - INT(AD/256) *256: POKE 1015, INT(AD/256)
50 REM REAL ESTATE GAME--BARINIT.BAS
75 REM *******ADD RESET DISABLE*******
100 REM 
150 CLEAR 
200 REM THIS IS THE ERROR VECTOR
210 D$ = CHR$(4)
220 OP$ = D$ +"OPEN "
230 CL$ = D$ +"CLOSE "
240 RA$ = D$ +"READ "
250 WR$ = D$ +"WRITE "
300 FL = 1
310 ONERR GOTO 12500
400 DIM MN$(12),EV%(216),OF%(110,2),PR%(60,10),TR(15,4),OT(7,10),PT(7,23),OL%(25),TF%(9,8),TF$(9),S3(3,6),SP(3,3)
410 DIM FT$(11)
450 VQ = 5: REM INITIALIZE MAXIMUM LINE INPUT
500 BS(1) = 90000:BS(2) = 200000:BS(3) = 40000:BS(4) = 110000
550 YR = 84: REM REMEMBER CURRENT YEAR
600 SC$(1) = " "
650 SC$(2) = " "
670 FD = 360:S2 = 180
680 SP$(1) = "LIMITED PARTNERSHIP."
681 SP$(2) = "REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST."
682 SP$(3) = "UNCLE HERMAN'S R.E. PROJECT.
700 ST$(1) = "NOVICE"
750 ST$(2) = "INVESTOR"
800 ST$(3) = "BROKER"
850 ST$(4) = "BARON"
900 MN$(1) = "JAN":MN$(2) = "FEB":MN$(3) = "MAR"
950 MN$(4) = "APR":MN$(5) = "MAY":MN$(6) = "JUN"
1000 MN$(7) = "JUL":MN$(8) = "AUG":MN$(9) = "SEP"
1050 MN$(10) = "OCT":MN$(11) = "NOV":MN$(12) = "DEC"
1099 LN$(0) = "REAL ESTATE INDEX"
1100 LN$(1) = "MORTGAGE":LN$(2) = "RESIDENTIAL":LN$(3) = "BUSINESS"
1150 LN$(4) = "LAND":LN$(5) = "CALIFORNIA":LN$(6) = "TEXAS"
1200 LN$(7) = "KANSAS":LN$(8) = "FLORIDA":LN$(9) = "NEW YORK"
1250 SN$(1) = "MORT":SN$(2) = "RESI":SN$(3) = "BUSI"
1300 SN$(4) = "LAND":SN$(5) = "CA":SN$(6) = "TX"
1350 SN$(7) = "KS":SN$(8) = "FL":SN$(9) = "NY"
1351 FT$(11) = "^^,^^^,^^^"
1352 FT$(0) = "^^^^^^^.^":FT$(1) = "^^^^^^.^%":FT$(10) = "^^,^^^,^^$"
1353 FOR X = 2 TO 9:FT$(X) = "^^^^^,^^$": NEXT X
1354 DP%(0) = 10:DP%(1) = 10
1355 FOR X = 2 TO 9:DP%(X) = 1: NEXT X
1356 TM(0) = 999:TM(1) = 99
1358 FOR X = 2 TO 9:TM(X) = 999999: NEXT X
1400 AM(1) = 35000:AM(2) = 99999.9:AM(3) = 249999.9
1450 AM(4) = 999999.9:AM(5) = 100000
1500 HOME : VTAB 3: HTAB 17: PRINT "BARON"
1550 VTAB 5: HTAB 7: PRINT "THE REAL ESTATE SIMULATION"
1600 VTAB 8: HTAB 19: PRINT "BY": VTAB 9: HTAB 11: PRINT "BLUE CHIP SOFTWARE"
1650 VTAB 15: HTAB 10: PRINT "WRITTEN BY JIM ZUBER";
1660 VTAB 16: HTAB 9: PRINT "ASSISTED BY THE HOGENS";
1700 VTAB 10: HTAB 13: PRINT "COPYRIGHT 1983": VTAB 11: HTAB 10: PRINT "CRACKED BY THE WHIP": VTAB 14: HTAB 14: PRINT "VERSION 1.0"
1750 VTAB 19: HTAB 1: PRINT " DO YOU WANT TO PLAY A NEW GAME, A";
1800 VTAB 20: HTAB 1: PRINT " SAVED GAME, OR CLEAR THE PLAYER";
1850 VTAB 21: HTAB 1: PRINT "DIRECTORY? TYPE NEW, SAVED, OR CLEAR"
1860 VTAB 22: HTAB 1: PRINT " AND PRESS RETURN"
1900 VTAB 23: HTAB 18: GOSUB 13450:AN$ = Z$
1950 IF AN$ = "NEW" THEN GOSUB 8250: GOTO 2150
2000 IF AN$ = "SAVED" THEN GOSUB 10300: GOTO 2150
2010 IF AN$ = "CLEAR" THEN GOSUB 8210: GOTO 1500
2100 VTAB 24: HTAB 1: PRINT "YOU MUST TYPE NEW, SAVED, OR CLEAR";: VTAB 23: HTAB 19: PRINT " ";: PRINT CHR$(7);: GOTO 1900
2150 PRINT OP$ +"RANDOM.DTA"
2160 PRINT RA$ +"RANDOM.DTA": INPUT NN,N1
2175 RD = NN
2180 FOR X = 1 TO N1:T = RND(NN): NEXT X
2185 NN = NN +1:N1 = N1 +1
2190 IF NN >32000 THEN NN = 1
2195 IF N1 >100 THEN N1 = 2
2200 PRINT CL$
2201 PRINT OP$ +"RANDOM.DTA": PRINT WR$ +"RANDOM.DTA"
2204 PRINT NN: PRINT N1
2206 PRINT CL$
2210 PRINT OP$ +"GCHAR.DTA": PRINT RA$ +"GCHAR.DTA"
2215 FOR X = 1 TO 6
2220 INPUT GC%(X)
2225 NEXT X
2230 PRINT CL$
2249 IF AN$ = "SAVED" THEN GOTO 5250
2250 HOME : VTAB 9: HTAB 5: PRINT "SIT BACK AND RELAX AS IT WILL TAKE"
2300 VTAB 10: HTAB 5: PRINT "ABOUT 5 MINUTES TO PUT TOGETHER AN"
2350 VTAB 11: HTAB 10: PRINT "EXCITING GAME FOR YOU."
2450 REM RANDOMLY SET UP TABLE POINTERS IN PONT()
2500 REM A NEGATIVE NUMBER INDICATED A BACKWARD SELECTION METHOD
2550 REM PONT(1) IS MORTGAGE AND THE NUMBER IS THE STARTING ELEMENT
2600 REM PONT(2)-(4) ARE INVESTMENT TYPES:RESID,COMMR,LAND AND THE NUMBER CORISPOND TO THE SELECTED TABLE
2650 REM PONT(5)-(9) ARE STATES:CA,TX,CO,FL,NY AND THE NUMBER POINTS TO THE TABLE
2750 REM SET UP MORTGAGE POINTER
2800 PO(1) = INT( RND(NN) *2 +1): IF PO(1) = 2 THEN PO(1) = -1
2850 PO(1) = INT( RND(NN) *264 +1) *PO(1)
2900 IF PO(1) <0 THEN PO(1) = PO(1) -88
2950 REM CALC INVEST AND AREA POINTERS
3000 FOR X = 2 TO 9
3050 PO(X) = INT( RND(NN) *2 +1): IF PO(X) = 2 THEN PO(X) = -1
3100 T = INT( RND(NN) *21 +1)
3150 T1 = 0: FOR Y = 2 TO 9: IF T = ABS(PO(Y)) THEN T1 = 1
3200 NEXT Y: IF T1 = 1 THEN GOTO 3100
3250 PO(X) = T *PO(X)
3300 NEXT X
3310 REM RANDOMLY SELECT SPECPORT PARAMETERS
3315 REM 1=AMOUNT 2=PERIOD 3=RESULT
3320 FOR X = 1 TO 3
3325 SP(X,2) = INT( RND(NN) *8 +4)
3326 T = INT( RND(NN) *16 +1)
3327 IF T <9 THEN SP(X,3) = -1: GOTO 3340
3328 IF T <11 THEN SP(X,3) = -.5: GOTO 3340
3329 IF T <13 THEN SP(X,3) = 0: GOTO 3340
3330 SP(X,3) = (T -12) *2
3340 NEXT X
3350 REM RANDOMLY SELECT OFFERS
3400 FOR X = 1 TO 90
3450 T = INT( RND(NN) *110 +1)
3500 IF OF%(T,1) < >0 THEN GOTO 3450
3550 OF%(T,1) = T:OF%(T,2) = X
3600 NEXT X
3605 REM ********SORT OFFER
3610 D = 109
3615 D = INT(D/2): IF D <1 THEN GOTO 3650
3620 FOR J = 1 TO 110 -D: FOR I = J TO 1 STEP -D
3625 IF OF%(I +D,2) >OF%(I,2) THEN GOTO 3642
3630 T = OF%(I,1):T2 = OF%(I,2)
3633 OF%(I,1) = OF%(I +D,1):OF%(I,2) = OF%(I +D,2)
3637 OF%(I +D,1) = T:OF%(I +D,2) = T2
3640 NEXT I
3642 NEXT J
3644 GOTO 3615
3646 REM END OF SORT ROUTINE
3650 REM PUT MORTGAGE DATA IN PR%(X,1)
3700 PRINT OP$ +"MORTGAGE.RND,L4"
3800 CU = ABS(PO(1)):KD = 1:DR = 1: IF PO(1) <0 THEN DR = -1
3850 FOR WE = 1 TO 60: REM WE IS REALLY MONTH
3900 GOSUB 5350: GOSUB 6250
3950 PR%(WE,1) = DA
4000 NEXT WE
4050 PRINT CL$
4100 REM PUT TY AND AREA DATA IN PR%(2)-PR%(9)
4150 PRINT OP$ +"DATA.RND,L5"
4250 FOR KD = 2 TO 9:DR = 1: IF PO(KD) <0 THEN DR = -1
4300 CU = 1: IF DR = -1 THEN CU = 90
4350 FOR WE = 1 TO 60
4400 GOSUB 5350: GOSUB 6250
4450 PR%(WE,KD) = DA
4500 NEXT WE
4550 NEXT KD
4552 PRINT CL$
4555 REM CALCULATE RE INDEX
4560 FOR X = 1 TO 60
4562 T = 0
4565 FOR Y = 2 TO 4
4570 FOR Z = 5 TO 9
4575 T = T +PR%(X,Y) *PR%(X,Z)/1000
4580 NEXT Z: NEXT Y
4585 PR%(X,10) = T/15
4590 NEXT X
4600 PRINT CL$
4750 REM INITIALIZE TR()
4800 FOR X = 1 TO 15
4850 FOR Y = 1 TO 4
4900 TR(X,Y) = PR%(1, INT(X/3 +.9) +4)/1000 *PR%(1,X -3 * INT(X/3 -.2) +1)/1000 *BS(X -3 * INT(X/3 -.2))
4950 NEXT Y: NEXT X
5000 SR = MY
5050 WE = 2
5250 GOSUB 14110: PRINT D$ +"BLOAD CHAIN,A520": CALL 520"BARPLAY.BAS"
5300 REM ***************END OF INITIAL********************
5350 REM MANIPULATE DATA.FIN SUB
5400 REM YOU MUST PASS KD,CU,DR
5450 REM DR MUST BE SET TO 1=FOREWARD -1=BACKWARD
5500 REM ROUTINE INCREMENTS/DECREMENTS CU
5550 REM RETURNS DATA STORED IN DA
5600 REM RETURNS EVENT NUMBER IN EV 0=NONE 1=GOOD 2=MIXED 3=BAD
5650 EV = 0
5700 IF KD = 1 THEN PRINT RA$ +"MORTGAGE.RND,R";CU: INPUT DA
5750 IF KD >1 THEN PRINT RA$ +"DATA.RND,R";( ABS(PO(KD)) -1) *90 +CU: INPUT DA
5800 IF KD = 1 THEN DA = INT(DA *10 +.1)
5850 IF DA >9950 THEN GOTO 6000
5900 CU = CU +DR
5950 GOTO 6200
6000 REM 
6050 EV = INT(1000.1 -DA/10)
6100 CU = CU +DR *2
6150 GOTO 5700
6200 RETURN 
6250 REM ROUTINE TO DETERMINE EVENT MARKERS
6300 IF EV = 0 GOTO 6850
6350 REM PASS KD,EV,WE TO ROUTINE
6400 REM WILL STORE WE IN EV%() SUBSCRIPT=EVENT POINTER
6450 MS = INT(( RND(NN) *8) +1)
6700 MS = (KD -1) *24 +(EV -1) *8 +MS
6750 IF EV%(MS) >0 THEN GOTO 6450
6800 EV%(MS) = WE
6850 RETURN 
6900 REM DEBUG ROUTINE
6950 PRINT "TABLE POINTERS"
7000 FOR X = 1 TO 9
7050 PRINT X,PO(X)
7100 NEXT X
7150 PRINT CHR$(12)
7200 PRINT "EVENT TABLES": PRINT : PRINT "EVENT","WEEK"
7250 FOR X = 1 TO 216
7300 PRINT X,EV%(X)
7350 NEXT X
7400 PRINT CHR$(12): PRINT "OFFER TABLE": PRINT : PRINT "OFFER","ORDER"
7450 FOR X = 1 TO 110
7500 PRINT OF%(X,1),OF%(X,2)
7545 NEXT X
7550 PRINT CHR$(12): PRINT "MORTGAGE RATES": PRINT : PRINT "WEEK","DATA","RATE"
7600 FOR X = 1 TO 60
7650 PRINT X,PR%(X,1)/10,PR%(X,1)/100;"%"
7700 NEXT X
7750 PRINT CHR$(12): PRINT "INVESTMENT TYPE RATES": PRINT : PRINT "WEEK","RESID","COMMERC","LAND"
7800 FOR X = 1 TO 60
7850 PRINT X,PR%(X,2)/10;"%",PR%(X,3)/10;"%",PR%(X,4)/10;"%"
7900 NEXT X
7950 PRINT CHR$(12): PRINT "AREA TYPE RATES": PRINT : PRINT "WEEK","CALIF","TEXAS","COLO","FLORIDA","NEW YORK"
8000 FOR X = 1 TO 60
8050 PRINT X,PR%(X,5)/10;"%",PR%(X,6)/10;"%",PR%(X,7)/10;"%",PR%(X,8)/10;"%",PR%(X,9)/10;"%"
8100 NEXT X
8110 PRINT CHR$(12): PRINT "TRANSACTION TABLES": PRINT : PRINT "TYPE","-1-","-2-","-3-","-4-"
8115 FOR X = 1 TO 15
8120 PRINT X,TR(X,1),TR(X,2),TR(X,3),TR(X,4)
8130 NEXT X
8140 PRINT CHR$(12)
8142 PRINT "R.E. INDEX": PRINT "MONTH","DATA","INDEX": PRINT 
8144 FOR X = 1 TO 60
8146 PRINT X,PR%(X,10),PR%(X,10)/10
8148 NEXT X
8149 PRINT CHR$(12)
8150 RETURN 
8200 REM END OF DEBUG
8210 REM CLEAR PLAYER IRECTORY
8212 HOME : VTAB 2: HTAB 1: PRINT "ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO"
8214 VTAB 3: HTAB 1: PRINT "CLEAR THE PLAYER DIRECTORY? (Y/N) ";
8216 GET X$: PRINT X$
8218 IF X$ < >"Y" THEN RETURN 
8220 PRINT OP$ +"PLAYER,L40"
8222 FOR X = 1 TO 15
8224 PRINT WR$ +"PLAYER,R";X
8226 PRINT "E";",";0;",";0;",";"E"
8228 NEXT X
8230 PRINT CL$
8232 VTAB 20: HTAB 1: PRINT "PLAYER DIRECTORY CLEAR COMPLETE"
8234 FOR X = 1 TO 1000: NEXT X
8236 RETURN 
8250 REM SUB FOR NEW GAME
8300 HOME 
8340 PRINT D$
8350 PRINT OP$ +"PLAYER,L40"
8450 VTAB 1: HTAB 1: PRINT " LAST HIGH "
8500 VTAB 2: HTAB 1: PRINT " NAME SCORE SCORE STATUS"
8550 VTAB 3: HTAB 1: PRINT " ----- -------- --------- ------------"
8600 FOR X = 1 TO 15
8605 X% = X
8650 PRINT RA$ +"PLAYER,R";X: INPUT PL$,LS,H,S5$
8655 PRINT D$
8700 IF H = 0 GOTO 9050
8750 VTAB X% +3: HTAB 1: PRINT X%;".";
8800 VTAB X% +3: HTAB 4: PRINT PL$;
8850 VTAB X% +3: HTAB 9: & PRUS,("^^^^^^^^$",LS);
8900 VTAB X% +3: HTAB 19: & PRUS,("^^^^^^^^$",H);
8950 VTAB X% +3: HTAB 29: PRINT S5$
9000 NEXT X
9050 VTAB 20: HTAB 7: PRINT "ENTER PLAYER NUMBER TO START."
9100 VTAB 21: HTAB 3: PRINT "IF YOU ARE A NEW PLAYER PRESS RETURN."
9150 VTAB 22: HTAB 1: PRINT " ";: GOSUB 13450:Q$ = Z$
9200 Q = VAL(Q$)
9250 IF Q$ = "" THEN IF X% = 15 THEN VTAB 23: HTAB 1: PRINT " YOU MAY NOT ADD ANY NEW PLAYERS.";: PRINT CHR$(7);: VTAB 22: HTAB 22: PRINT " ";: GOTO 9050
9300 IF Q$ = "" GOTO 9900
9350 IF VAL(Q$) <1 THEN VTAB 23: HTAB 1: PRINT " YOU MUST ENTER A VALID NUMBER.";: PRINT CHR$(7);: VTAB 22: HTAB 22: PRINT " ";: GOTO 9050
9400 IF Q >X% -1 THEN VTAB 23: HTAB 1: PRINT " YOU MUST ENTER A VALID NUMBER.";: PRINT CHR$(7);: VTAB 22: HTAB 22: PRINT " ";: GOTO 9050
9445 PRINT D$
9450 PRINT RA$ +"PLAYER,R";Q: INPUT PL$,LS,H,S5$
9500 NM = Q
9550 ST$ = S5$
9600 FOR GG = 12 TO 1 STEP -1
9650 IF MID$ (ST$,GG,1) < >" " THEN ST$ = LEFT$(ST$,GG): GOTO 9750
9700 NEXT GG
9750 HM = H
9800 IF LS >AM(4) -1 THEN GOTO 9825
9820 MY = LS: GOTO 9850
9825 MY = AM(5)
9850 PRINT CL$: RETURN 
9900 HOME 
9950 VTAB 1: HTAB 1: PRINT "PLEASE ENTER YOUR INITIALS";: GOSUB 13450:IN$ = Z$
10000 MY = AM(1):H = MY:HM = MY:LS = MY
10050 PL$ = IN$
10100 ST$ = ST$(1):S5$ = ST$
10150 PRINT D$: PRINT WR$ +"PLAYER,R";X: PRINT PL$;",";LS;",";H;",";ST$
10200 NM = X
10250 GOTO 9850
10300 REM SUB FOR SAVED GAME
10350 REM CAN BE USED FOR BOTH SAVING AND LOADING
10400 REM IF FLAG=1 THEN DATA WILL BE LOADED
10450 REM IF FLAG=0 THEN DATA WILL BE SAVED
10500 HOME : VTAB 12: HTAB 10: PRINT "WAIT A MOMENT....";
10510 PRINT D$
10650 PRINT OP$ +"SAVE"
10660 PRINT RA$ +"SAVE"
10700 FOR X = 1 TO 60
10750 FOR Y = 1 TO 10
10820 INPUT PR%(X,Y)
10850 NEXT Y
10900 NEXT X
10950 FOR X = 1 TO 110
11020 INPUT OF%(X,1),OF%(X,2)
11050 NEXT X
11120 INPUT MY,ST$,NM,WE,SR,HM
11400 FOR X = 1 TO 216
11470 INPUT EV%(X)
11500 NEXT X
11550 FOR X = 1 TO 15
11600 FOR Y = 1 TO 4
11670 INPUT TR(X,Y)
11700 NEXT Y
11750 NEXT X
11800 FOR X = 1 TO 7
11850 FOR Y = 1 TO 23
11920 INPUT PT(X,Y)
11950 NEXT Y
12000 NEXT X
12050 FOR X = 1 TO 7
12100 FOR Y = 1 TO 10
12170 INPUT OT(X,Y)
12200 NEXT Y
12250 NEXT X
12300 FOR X = 1 TO 7
12370 INPUT OT$(X),PT$(X)
12380 NEXT X
12400 FOR X = 1 TO 25
12408 INPUT OL%(X)
12410 NEXT X
12420 FOR X = 1 TO 9
12426 INPUT TF$(X)
12430 FOR Y = 1 TO 8
12436 INPUT TF%(X,Y)
12440 NEXT Y: NEXT X
12441 FOR X = 1 TO 3
12442 FOR Y = 1 TO 6
12443 INPUT S3(X,Y)
12444 NEXT Y
12445 FOR Y = 1 TO 3
12446 INPUT SP(X,Y)
12447 NEXT Y: NEXT X
12450 PRINT CL$: RETURN 
12500 ER = PEEK(222): IF ER = 70 GOTO 13050
12550 IF ER < >53 GOTO 12650
12600 HOME : PRINT CHR$(7);: VTAB 12: HTAB 10: PRINT "NO SAVED GAME FOUND": GOTO 12800
12650 HOME 
12700 VTAB 11: HTAB 13: PRINT "UNKNOWN ERROR"
12750 VTAB 12: HTAB 10: PRINT "ERROR ";ER;" AT LINE "; PEEK(218) + PEEK(219) *256
12800 FOR RR = 1 TO 4000
12850 NEXT RR
12900 PRINT CL$
12950 CLEAR 
13000 GOTO 100
13050 HOME : PRINT CHR$(7);: PRINT CHR$(7);: PRINT CHR$(7);: PRINT CHR$(7);:
13100 VTAB 12: HTAB 9: PRINT "REMOVE WRITE PROTECT TAB"
13150 VTAB 13: HTAB 12: PRINT "FROM BARON DISKETTE"
13200 VTAB 24: HTAB 9: PRINT "PRESS ANY KEY TO RESUME GAME";
13250 GET WT$
13350 PRINT CL$
13400 GOTO 8250
13450 REM INPUT ROUTINE
13600 PRINT CHR$(7);:ZZ$ = "": PRINT "? ";:PZ = 1
13650 GET Z$
13750 IF ASC(Z$) >96 THEN Z$ = CHR$( ASC(Z$) -32)
13800 IF Z$ = CHR$(13) THEN Z$ = ZZ$:VQ = 5: RETURN 
13850 Z1 = POS(N) -1: REM REM CURRENT POSITION LESS ONE
13900 IF ( ASC(Z$) = 8) AND ( LEN(ZZ$) = 0) THEN PRINT CHR$(7);: GOTO 13650
13950 IF ( ASC(Z$) = 8) AND ( LEN(ZZ$) = 1) THEN ZZ$ = "": PRINT Z$;" ";Z$;: GOTO 13650
14000 IF ASC(Z$) = 8 THEN ZZ$ = LEFT$(ZZ$, LEN(ZZ$) -1): PRINT Z$;" ";Z$;: GOTO 13650
14050 IF LEN(ZZ$) = >VQ THEN PRINT CHR$(7);: GOTO 13650
14100 ZZ$ = ZZ$ +Z$: PRINT Z$;: GOTO 13650
14110 HOME : PRINT CHR$(7); CHR$(7); CHR$(7);
14120 VTAB 10: HTAB 18: PRINT "STOP !!!!"
14130 VTAB 12: HTAB 7: PRINT "PLEASE REMOVE THE DISK FROM"
14140 VTAB 13: HTAB 4: PRINT "THE DRIVE AND TURN IT OVER SO THE"
14150 VTAB 14: HTAB 13: PRINT "LABEL IS FACING": FLASH : VTAB 16: HTAB 16: PRINT "DOWNWARDS": NORMAL 
14155 VTAB 24: HTAB 6: PRINT "PRESS SPACE BAR TO CONTINUE";
14160 GET MM$: PRINT D$;: PRINT OP$ +"CHECK": PRINT RA$ +"CHECK": INPUT A
14170 PRINT CL$ +"CHECK": IF A < >2 GOTO 14110
14180 HOME : VTAB 12: HTAB 10: PRINT "WAIT A MOMENT....": RETURN
